Articles.Content:
I had recently purchased KSP from their website.

The installation process is fine but during loading it is stuck.

It is stuck at "Squad/SPP/Wings/swept2.

If I delete that part, It just moves to the one before which is "swept1" and so forth.

I tried reinstalling but same issue.

I have also tried running through launcher at lowest settings but it didn't work.

Computer Specs:

Intel i5 3210m- 2.5ghz dual core with Hyper threading.

Intel HD 4000 Graphics Card.

8GB DDR3 RAM.

500GB HDD with 350 GB Left.

The computer was able to run demo at medium settings quite easily.
Please see the stickied thread and provide more information. We need, at the very least, some log files to look through.

http://speedy.sh/aZ5gb/output-log.txt (Click on Slow Download) My output log

http://i.imgur.com/ch4lrtD.jpg
Very likely it's just Windows Data Execution Prevention preventing KSP from writing files, copy KSP to a non-Windows folder such as C:\Games and run the copy from there
Oh wow, That worked. I moved it from the documents to a folder on my desktop. It was able to load up on the first time.
Thanks for helping me. I can now fly my spacecraft and turn with my SAS unlike the demo
